parameters.name: AggregationIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the aggregation types for rules.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: IsContainer
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query only container images. Valid values:

*   **0**: no
*   **1**: yes

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The name of the system defense rule.

parameters.name: RuleTypes
parameters.description: The types of the system defense rules.

parameters.name: SystemType
parameters.description:
The type of the OS. Valid values:

*   **2**: Windows
*   **1**: Linux
*   **0**: all types
